human_meals_pet_safe.risk: contains onion, garlic, processed meats, and sauces
human_meals_pet_safe.pet_safe_version: remove onion and garlic, replace processed meats with plain cooked egg, chicken, or tuna; skip sauces

human_meals_pet_safe.risk: contains onions, sauces, high-fat cheese, and buns with salt/sugar
human_meals_pet_safe.pet_safe_version: plain cooked meat patty, small amount of plain cheese optional, plain cooked veggies, skip buns and sauces

human_meals_pet_safe.risk: contains onion, garlic, processed meats, high salt, cheese
human_meals_pet_safe.pet_safe_version: remove onion and garlic, use small amount of plain cheese, add plain cooked meat or veggies

human_meals_pet_safe.risk: contains chocolate, sugar, regular milk, nuts
human_meals_pet_safe.pet_safe_version: use lactose-free or goat milk ice cream, replace chocolate with carob powder, no nuts or sugar

human_meals_pet_safe.risk: spicy chili, garlic, onion, lemongrass, lime juice
human_meals_pet_safe.pet_safe_version: make a mild broth with plain cooked shrimp/chicken, skip spices, garlic, onion, and citrus

human_meals_pet_safe.risk: dressing may contain onion, garlic, salt, avocado, nuts
human_meals_pet_safe.pet_safe_version: use safe vegetables like cucumber, carrots, lettuce; add plain cooked chicken or egg; skip dressing, avocado, and nuts

human_meals_pet_safe.risk: contains onion, garlic, soy sauce, MSG, fatty broth
human_meals_pet_safe.pet_safe_version: plain cooked noodles with cooked chicken or egg, use mild homemade broth, skip seasoning and onions

human_meals_pet_safe.risk: fried in oil, salted, batter may contain seasoning
human_meals_pet_safe.pet_safe_version: use baked or boiled fish, plain cooked potato slices or steamed veggies, skip oil and salt

human_meals_pet_safe.risk: spices, onion, garlic, chili, coconut milk may be too rich
human_meals_pet_safe.pet_safe_version: plain cooked rice with cooked meat or veggies, skip spices, onion, garlic, and chili

human_meals_pet_safe.risk: contains fried anchovies, sambal chili, onion, coconut milk rice high in fat
human_meals_pet_safe.pet_safe_version: use plain cooked rice (no coconut milk), plain cooked egg or chicken, skip sambal and fried anchovies

human_meals_pet_safe.risk: onion, garlic, tomato sauce, seasoning
human_meals_pet_safe.pet_safe_version: plain cooked pasta with plain cooked meat, no tomato sauce or seasoning

human_meals_pet_safe.risk: onion, garlic, chili, cheese, sauces
human_meals_pet_safe.pet_safe_version: plain cooked meat in soft tortilla, skip onion, garlic, chili, and sauces

human_meals_pet_safe.risk: contains butter, milk, salt, onion in gravy
human_meals_pet_safe.pet_safe_version: plain boiled potatoes mashed with a little water, skip butter, milk, and gravy

human_meals_pet_safe.risk: breaded and fried with salt, oil, and spices
human_meals_pet_safe.pet_safe_version: plain cooked or baked chicken without breading or spices

human_meals_pet_safe.risk: raw fish may contain parasites, sauces may contain onion or soy sauce, avocado
human_meals_pet_safe.pet_safe_version: use cooked fish, skip sauces and avocado, plain rice and nori is safe in small amounts

human_meals_pet_safe.risk: contains sugar, butter, syrup, chocolate
human_meals_pet_safe.pet_safe_version: plain cooked pancake with water or goat milk, skip syrup, sugar, and chocolate

human_meals_pet_safe.risk: contains onion, garlic, soy sauce, oil, sometimes egg or processed meat
human_meals_pet_safe.pet_safe_version: plain cooked rice with cooked vegetables and plain cooked meat, no onion, garlic, soy sauce, or oil

human_meals_pet_safe.risk: contains cheese, milk, onion, garlic, pastry
human_meals_pet_safe.pet_safe_version: plain cooked egg with cooked veggies or meat, skip cheese, milk, onion, and pastry

human_meals_pet_safe.risk: contains onion, garlic, chili, cheese, beans may cause gas
human_meals_pet_safe.pet_safe_version: plain cooked meat with plain rice in tortilla, skip beans, onion, garlic, cheese, and spices

human_meals_pet_safe.risk: contains onion, garlic, soy sauce, oil, chili
human_meals_pet_safe.pet_safe_version: plain cooked noodles with cooked meat or vegetables, skip onion, garlic, soy sauce, oil, and chili
